page.title: 01UPLOWMAN VILLAGE
page.content: IN UPLOWMAN THERE IS A CHURCH WITH A TOWER AND SIX BELLS IT IS A ST PETERS CHURCH.THERE IS A SCHOOL WITH 21 CHILDREN IN THE JUNIOR CLASS AND 12 IN THE INFANT CLASS.THERE IS A PUB CALLED THE REDWOODS INN WHICH USED TO BE CALLED CROSSWAYS INN.THERE IS A RIVER CALLED LOWMAN GOING THROUGH THE VILLAGE. WE HAVE A SHOP WHICH IS A POST OFFICE TO IT IS A FAIRLY OLD BUILDING. YOU CAN GET TO UPLOWMAN BY THE M5 MOTORWAY. UPLOWMAN IS NEAR SAMPFORD PEVERELL AND TIVERTON. THERE ARE 8 COUNCIL HOUSES AND THERE ARE LOTS OF OTHER HOUSES BUT UPLOWMAN IS ONLY A SMALL VILLAGE AND THE COUNTRY SIDE AROUND THE VILLAGE IS VERY NICE.
